Sql.query: SELECT CATCODI, DESCAT, DESCORTACAT FROM CAM_CATALOGO WHERE DESCORTACAT = :DESCORTACAT ORDER BY CATCODI ASC

SELECT DC.CATCODI, DC.DATACATCODI, DC.DESDATACAT, DC.DESCORTADATACAT, DC.VALOR FROM CAM_DATACATALOGO DC INNER JOIN CAM_CATALOGO C ON C.CATCODI = DC.CATCODI WHERE C.CATCODI = :CATCODI AND C.DESCORTACAT = :DESCORTACAT ORDER BY DC.VALOR ASC
